tool_description: The GameRank API can be used to access, update, delete and insert information about players, games and plays in a game Reputation System. The reputation system ranks players by quality and ranks games by difficulty.
name: GameRank
title: GameRank

api_list.name: Get Problem Info

required_parameters.name: realm_id
required_parameters.description: The realm_id of the reputation system within which the problem info was computed

api_list.name: Get Latest Solution Date

required_parameters.name: realm_id
required_parameters.description: The realm id of the reputation system within which latest solution was created

api_list.name: Get Player Info

required_parameters.name: realm_id
required_parameters.description: The realm_id of the reputation system within which the player info was computed
